Con el ingreso de la cosecha que espera obtener quiere utilizarla en el bienestar y estudio de su familia y cumplir con algunas metas familiares y seguir invirtiendo más en los cultivos. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Lidieth, is 37 years old, she is married, and lives with her husband and her children who are her main priority. With this loan, she plans to buy fertilizers and other products to apply when sowing the crop and therein have as uniform a germination as possible so that the output from the crop is sufficient. She will also buy good quality corn and bean seeds which adapt well to the soil conditions and its fertility. Lidieth will also pay for labor to prepare the land and to apply the products, as well as help to plant once the land is ready. It is in this manner that she can be sure of doing a good job, what Lidieth plans to do is to make the most of the good weather and soil conditions that the area has for this crop. In addition to being able to buy better quality products so that her plantation develops healthily and properly at the same time as having a sufficient output and having a large production within a short time frame. With the income that she hopes to obtain from the crop, Lidieth wants to use it for her family's well-being and studies, and achieve some of her family's goal and continue investing more in the crops. 

This is the first loan Lidieth has received from FUDECOSUR. She has never had other loans from state banks, but FUDECOSUR has given her the loan much easier and with much lower interest rates.

loans.use: to sow beans.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more rice, oil, soap, tissue, batteries, and toothpaste for her business.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary lives in Ogongo, a small town in Homa Bay County. Homa Bay county is located in south-western Kenya, and borders onto Lake Victoria, the second-largest lake in the world. Populations are dense close to the lake, where many individuals make their living from fishing, and a few work in the small, but slowly growing, tourism industry. A popular tourist attraction in Homa Bay county is Ruma National Park, a game reserve that is home to the rare roan antelope, a shy species distantly related to the reticulated giraffe. Most people in Homa Bay make their living from farming, and the rolling hills of the area are dotted with fields and fruit tree plantations.

Mary is married and has four children. She runs a small business of selling grains while her husband is a retired construction worker. Both she and her husband are farmers. They have been farming for fourteen years now and they are currently growing maize, beans, soy beans and millet. Mary is excited about beekeeping as it will earn her some income and provide her with honey for food.

This is Mary’s first loan with Honey Care and she intends to use the proceeds from her beehives to pay school fees for her children and provide for her family’s basic needs. Mary’s hope for the future is to expand her beekeeping project.

loans.use: to buy beehives and apiary materials for honey production

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy tissues, soaps, cosmetics, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more beer, stout, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Miguel

texts.es: Miguel, tiene la edad  de 54 años, está casado,  vive con su esposa y sus hijos los cuales su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de fertilizantes y otros productos para aplicarle en el momento de la siembra y así que tenga una buena geminación, y semilla de frijol de buena calidad que se adapte bien a las condiciones del suelo y fertilidad del mismo, además pagar mano de obra en la preparación del terreno y la aplicación de los productos y asistencia de la plantación una vez que tenga desarrollo, y de esta manera asegurarse de realizar un buen trabajo. Lo que pretende es aprovechar las buenas condiciones de clima y suelo que cuenta la zona para este cultivo, y también poner en práctica la experiencia de varios años en el manejo de granos básicos. Además de poder comprar los mejores productos y de mejor calidad para que su plantación tenga un buen desarrollo y sanidad al igual que una cosecha adecuada, y tener a corto plazo una producción importante. Con el ingreso de la cosecha que espera obtener quiere utilizarla en el bienestar y estudio de su familia y cumplir con algunas metas familiares y seguir invirtiendo más en los cultivos. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Miguel, age 54, is married and lives with his wife and children, who are his highest priority. With this loan, he will buy fertilizers and other products that he will apply at planting time to assure a good germination. He will also buy high quality bean seeds that take well to the soil conditions and fertility. Finally, he will pay the labor costs that he requires to prepare the land, apply the products, and do the planting after the land is ready. This will help him to ensure the job is well done. He hopes to take advantage of the good climate and soil conditions in his area for the planting and also take advantage of his years of experience managing staple grains.

Apart from being able to buy the highest quality products so that his crop will be both well developed and healthy and produce a bountiful harvest, he also hopes for a good production in the short term.  He hopes to apply the income from this harvest for the well being and education of his families, as well as meet other family goals and continue investing in his cultivation. This is his first loan from FUDECOSUR. He hasn't had many loans before from state banks, but FUDECOSUR has provided him a loan with greater features and much lower interest rates.

loans.use: plant beans

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more door locks, hinges, nails, etc. for her business

loans.name: Parhoi Sornu Lom Group

texts.en:
An inspiring mother of seven kids and a successful weaver, Ngakip is 46 years old and the featured profile member for Parhoi Sornu Lom Group. “I was not interested in studies since my childhood and instead took a keen interest in weaving and cooking,” shares Ngakip and laughs. She is a weaver and that is how she generates income for herself and the family. She also comments that one’s job may be small and difficult but the other members are very inspired because despite her irregular and meager income, she is able to support her seven kids and get them settled down.
 
She weaves all traditional woven clothes including women's wrap-around skirts and men’s shawls. Her finished woven clothes are highly in demand in the village and nearby villages. The demand is greater during the wedding season and for cultural fests. With the Kiva loan, she is planning to purchase better, good quality yarn and silk threads to weave expensive woven clothes to sell. She is hopeful that she will be able to make a profitable investment. 

She says, "Thank-you so much Kiva”.

The rest of the group members are engaged in a piggery, a poultry business, a vegetable-selling business and weaving.

loans.use: To purchase a variety of yarn, threads, silk and other weaving tools

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more soft drinks, cold water, and candy for her business.

loans.name: Janet Marilu

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SEÑOR DE PAN DE AZUCAR DE CALCA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Calca, perteneciente a la provincia de Calca y departamento de Cusco.

La socia Janet Marilu tiene 27 años de edad,es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos,la socia se dedica al negocio de venta de zapatos,la socia vende zapatos para hombres,mujeres y niños,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de zapatos.La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar zapatos para niños,hombres y mujeres.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Janet belongs to the community bank "Señor de Pan de Azucar de Calca" (Lord of Sweet Bread of Calca). The bank is located in the district of Calca, province of Calca, Cusco department.

Janet Marilu is 27 years old. She lives with her partner and has three children. Her main work is selling shoes for men, women, and children. She works from 8:00 am until 6:00 pm and has several years of experience in this work. It's going well for her. Her dream is to expand her business. She is asking for the loan so that she can purchase more shoes.

She is grateful for the loan and promises to be timely with her repayments.

loans.use: buy shoes for her business.

loans.name: Nubia

texts.es: Ella es Nubia, tiene una edad de 49 años, es casada y tiene 3 hijos mayores de edad y profesionales, termino bachillerato el diciembre 12 del 1983, trabaja en una tienda naturista hace 20 años, ella es una persona muy responsable, integra y comprometida  en todo lo que se propone, quiere estudiar cosmetología y estética integral en tan prestigioso instituto llamado campo alto,  ya que ella le ha gustado mucho todo lo que sea de estética y podrá brindarles  a los pacientes una vida mejor y a gusto , pero para ello quiere solicitar el convenio con kiva, ya que  a ella le serviría mucho el apoyo económico que ustedes brindan a las personas que lo solicitan para el momento de estudiar y que no cuentan con el dinero completo para poder pagar la mensualidad que sin el convenio quedaría con unos valores un poco altos para ella.
texts.en: This is Nubia, she is 49 years old, married and has three adult children who are professionals. She completed the secondary education on December 12, 1983. She has been working in a herbal health store for 20 years. She is a very responsible, honest and committed person in everything that she does. Nubia wants to study cosmetics and cosmetic treatments in the prestigious Campo Alto institute, as she very much likes everything about beauty and she will be able to give patients a better, more comfortable life. However, to do so, she wants to call on the help of Kiva as the financial support that you are giving to people who want to study and do not have all the money to pay the monthly installments will help her a lot. Without this help, she would otherwise be left with fees that are a bit too high for her.

loans.use: to pay for a semester of studies.

loans.name: Alejandra

texts.es: Ella es alejandra  tiene 20 años,  salió del colegio la merced en el año 2010  convive con los padres y tiene 2 hermanos mayores ya profesionales , se destaca por ser  una persona respetuosa, compañerita, responsable, solidaria y bondadosa, quiere ser una gran auxiliar en enfermería, quiere entrar al instituto campo alto y poder culminar los sueños, pero para eso necesita la ayuda del convenio de kiva ya que le sería de gran ayuda, que ella no tiene  todo el presupuesto que le solicita el instituto, espera le den la oportunidad y pueda estar en tan prestigioso instituto para que ella pueda ayudar y curar a las personas que más lo necesitan.
texts.en:
She is Alejandra. She is 20 years old and graduated from the school La Merced in the year 2010. She lives with her parents and 2 older brothers who are already professionals. She stands out as a respectful person, a good partner, responsible, supportive and kind.

She wants to be a great nurse's aid. She wants to study at the Campo Alto Institute and be able to realize her dreams, but to do this, she needs help from Kiva. This would be of great help to her, because she does not have the finances that the institute is asking for. She hopes they give her the opportunity and that she is able to be in such a prestigious institute, so that she can help and treat the people who most need it.

loans.use: to pay for one semester of enrollment.

loans.name: Ne'ma

texts.en:
Ne'ma was born in 1958. She is a widow living alone in a rented house. She lives in a sector in Jordan called Marka. 

She has been trying her best to support herself and to cover her expenses by running a business selling clothes at her house for the last three years. 

Ne'ma needs to expand her business by buying a larger quantity and variety of clothes in order to attract more customers and to increase her profits. She  doesn't have enough money to buy more clothes, so she has applied for a loan.

loans.use: to buy more clothing to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more soap, powder and others items for her shop.

loans.name: Enoe De La Concepción

texts.es: La señora Enoe de la Concepcion, habita en el municipio de Ticuantepe en el barrio llamado La Francia, junto a su familia se propone como meta mejorar sus condiciones de vida, ella se dedica al trabajo de la tierra cosecha Piña, Actualmente requiere de capital para darle mantenimiento a su cosecha de 2 manzanas, el credito lo solita para comprar fertilizantes, triple, completo, urea, etc. ya que en ella quiere prevenir las propagacion de la plaga y distintos insectos que rondean la cosecha, Agradece el apoyo que Afodenic y Kiva le han brindado.
texts.en:
Sra. Enoe de la Concepción lives in the neighborhood of La Francia in the town of Ticuantepe. She and her family are striving to improve their living conditions. Enoe works on her land where she grow pineapples.

She is currently in need of capital so that she can maintain two plots of her crop. Enoe will use the money to buy fertilizers, "Triple" (a brand of fertilizer), "Completo" (another brand of fertilizer), urea, and other supplies. She wants to prevent the spread of pests and various insects that could ruin her crops.

Sra. Enoe is grateful for the assistance that AFODENIC and Kiva have offered.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies for growing pineapple.

loans.name: Tawfeq

texts.en:
Tawfeq is a single young man from Nablus, Palestine. He lives with his family in a small, simple house. His father is a construction worker and earns a low income. 

Tawfeq is a student in a local university where he studies Psychology. He is a very smart student and would like to finish his studies so he can find a job to help his family with their expenses. 

He obtained a $1000 loan from Palestine for Credit & Development (FATEN). This loan will help him to pay for the university fees for this semester. 

With this loan, Tawfeq will be able to finish his studies and earn a bachelor's degree. 

Tawfeq appears in the above photo.

loans.use: to pay the university fees for this semester

loans.name: Emeliana

texts.en:
Emeliana is married with two children. She is 56 years old and lives in Pagadian.

She sells banana que and other snacks to earn a living and has had this business for three years.

Emeliana has requested a loan to purchase additional raw ingredients for her snack food vending business. She has been a member of Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative (PMPC) for three years.

In the future, Emeliana hopes to own a snack bar.

loans.use: to purchase additional raw ingredients for the snack vending business

loans.name: Gnessigui Group

texts.fr:
Les six femmes du groupe Gnessigui sont mariées dans des ménages polygamiques. Elles ont en moyenne 37 ans et 4 enfants. Elles habitent toutes  dans le village de Banankoroniwere dans la région de Ségou (4ème Région administrative de la République du Mali). Elles se sont connues à travers des liens de voisinage, de parenté et de leurs activités génératrices de revenu dans le village. Elles font le petit commerce de sucre, de mil et la restauration. Elles demandent ce prêt dans le but de diversifier et  d’augmenter leurs fonds de commerce, les membres du groupe ont décidé de collaborer avec Soro Yiriwaso et sont à leur 7eme cycle du prêt solidaire.
 Madame Assitan debout au milieu est une vendeuses de sucre dans le village de Banankororniwere et environ. Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter  3 sacs de sucre. Elle revend  au comptant à la maison et au marché du village à une clientèle mixte. Madame Assitan espère réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 25 000FCFA avec ce prêt. Ce bénéfice  sera utilisé pour les frais de scolarisation de ses enfants et la prise en charge d’une partie de la famille.
texts.en:
The six members of the Gnessigui group are married women who live in polygamous families. They average 37 years of age and four children each. They all live in the village of Banankoroniwere, in the region of Ségou (4th administrative region of the Republic of Mali). They know one another as neighbors, through ties of kinship, and through the income-generating activities they conduct in the village. As a group, they sell sugar and millet, and they provide restaurant services. 

To bolster their working capital and diversify their activities, the members decided to join the Soro Yiriwaso microfinance organization. This is their 7th group loan.

Mrs. Assitan, standing in the center of the photo, is a reseller of sugar in Banankoroniwere and surrounding areas. She plans to use her loan to buy 3 sacks of sugar. She sells for cash to a mixed clientele, from her home and at the village market.  

With this loan, Mrs. Assitan expects to earn an average monthly profit of 25,000 FCFA. She will use this profit to handle part of the household expenses and to cover her children’s tuition fees.

loans.use: to buy sugar for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay the university fees for this semester

loans.name: Eli Onan

texts.es:
Eli tiene 28 años de edad, reside en un caserío alejado a seis kilómetros de la ciudad más cercana, vive rentando una casa desde que se casó hace tres años con su esposa, con quien tiene un niño  de dos  años de edad, con quien ha luchado pues fue operado del labio debido a un problema de nacimiento. Su esposa trabaja cuidando una casa en la ciudad de lunes a viernes, y los días sábados y domingos estudia a distancia en el instituto de la ciudad.
Eli creció con sus padres, es el mayor de sus cincos hermanos quienes siempre han trabajado en la agricultura y las hortalizas. Estudio hasta tercer grado del nivel básico en la escuela de la comunidad. 

Eli trabaja desde que tenía 10 años de edad, su padre le enseño a las siembras de maíz y frijoles, también lo creció trabajando en la siembra de hortalizas, cuando se casó decidio a emprenderse a cultivar las hortalizas (siembra de tomates, pepinos y ejotes), pues en el lugar es bueno para la venta eso le permite obtener ingresos económicos para su hogar. 
Siembra 3500 metros cuadrados de hortalizas en su comunidad, de la cual está pendiente todos los días desde las seis de la mañana hasta las cuatro de la tarde, su esposa le ayuda al cuido de las pequeñas parcelas de hortalizas.
Solicita un crédito en credicampo, para invertir $250 en la compra de insumos agrícola para sembrar una parcela de pepinos, también necesita $200 para la compra de insumos para la siembra de ejotes, el resto lo necesita para la compra de madera y de teja, pues necesita hacer unos arreglos en la casa donde vive.
Eli sueña con hacer su propia casa en la comunidad aunque sea de adobe, para comenzar también planea incrementar poco a poco el área donde cultivara las hortalizas. Está en disposición de apoyar a su esposa para que siga estudiando y salir adelante para darle lo mejor a su hijo.
texts.en:
Eli is 28 years old. He lives in a village about six km from the nearest city. He has rented a home with his wife since they got married three years ago, and they have a two year old son. Their son's a fighter: he just had a lip surgery done due to a birth defect. His wife works as a housekeeper from Monday to Friday, and on Saturday and Sunday, she takes distance-learning classes at an institute in the city. Eli grew up with his parents. He is the oldest of five brothers who have always been farmers and vegetable growers. He studied through the third grade at a local school. He's been working since he was ten years old. He learned to plant corn and beans from his father, and he grew up planting vegetables. When he got married, he decided to take up growing vegetables such as tomatoes, cucumbers, and green beans, as these are profitable crops in his area and help him earn money for his household.

He plants 3500 sq. meters of vegetables in his community, working every day from 6:00 in the morning until 4:00 in the afternoon. His wife helps him tend to the smaller parcels of land. He is asking for a loan from Credicampo to invest $250 in buying farming supplies so he can plant a parcel in cucumbers. He also needs another $200 for planting green beans. The rest he will use to buy wood and tile as there are some repairs he needs to make to his home. Eli dreams of building his own home in the village, though it would be of adobe. He is also planning to expand the area he plants a little at a time. He wishes to keep supporting his wife in her studies and be able to provide a better life for his son.

loans.use: buy farming supplies for his business, and wood and tile for his home.

loans.name: Marvin

texts.es: Marvin, tiene la edad  de 34 años, está en unión libre,  vive con su esposa y su hijo los cuales su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de fertilizantes y otros productos para aplicarle en el momento de la siembra y así que tenga una buena geminación, y semilla de frijol de buena calidad, además pagar mano de obra para la aplicación de los productos y asistencia de la plantación una vez que tenga desarrollo, y de esta manera asegurarse de realizar un buen trabajo. Lo que pretende es aprovechar las buenas condiciones de clima y suelo que cuenta la zona para este cultivo, y también poner en práctica la experiencia de varios años en el manejo de granos básicos. Además de poder comprar los mejores productos y de mejor calidad para que su plantación tenga un buen desarrollo y sanidad al igual que una cosecha adecuada, y tener a corto plazo una producción importante. Con el ingreso de la cosecha que espera obtener quiere utilizarla en el bienestar y estudio de su familia y cumplir con algunas metas familiares y seguir invirtiendo más en los cultivos. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Marvin, age 34, is in a common-law marriage and lives with his wife and children, who are his highest priority. With this loan, he will buy fertilizers and other products that he will apply at planting time to assure a good germination. He will also buy high quality bean seeds that take well to the soil conditions and fertility. Finally, he will pay the labor costs that he requires to prepare the land, apply the products, and do the planting after the land is ready. This will help him to ensure the job is well done. He hopes to take advantage of the good climate and soil conditions in his area for the planting and also take advantage of his years of experience managing staple grains.
Apart from being able to buy the highest quality products so that his crop will be both well developed and healthy and produce a bountiful harvest, he also hopes for a good production in the short term. He hopes to apply the income from this harvest for the well being and education of his families, as well as meet other family goals and continue investing in his cultivation. This is his first loan from FUDECOSUR. He hasn't had many loans before from state banks, but FUDECOSUR has provided him a loan with greater features and much lower interest rates.

loans.use: plant beans

loans.name: Ana Mrisol

texts.es:
Ana de 21 años de edad, ella estudio hasta primer año de bachillerato, dejo de estudiar cuando salió embarazada, actualmente está acompañada su compañero de vida se dedica a trabajar la agricultura, el aprendió el oficio de su abuelo ya que su padre los abandono a él y su mamá cuando era un niño, la hija tiene 15 meses de vida y es muy sana, viven en la casa de la suegra. Los gastos del hogar son repartidos entre todos ellos así se ayudan a salir adelante entre todos.

Ana se dedica a los oficios del hogar a esto se ha dedicado toda su vida, ya que ha tenido que trabajar desde pequeña para ayudarle a su familia con todos los gastos de su hogar, de esta forma pudo adquirir un trabajo, como mesera en un restaurante de la ciudad. Esto le implica tener que trasladarse unos 45 minutos para llegar a su lugar de trabajo esto es de todo los días.

Con el crédito ella comprara fertilizantes y semillas para una hortaliza, ya que el esposo se dedica a este trabajo, tendrá un benefició porque el terreno donde cultivan, tiene acceso a agua natural con la cual ellos regaran sus cultivos, de esta manera pretenden tener un ingreso extra, cuando vendan la producción que obtengan,  con el crédito podrán realizar este proyecto en un corto tiempo, ya que con el dinero compraran todo lo necesario sin andar viajando tanto. 

Ana sueña a futuro poder terminar sus estudios como bachiller, ya que siente que así podrá tener una mejor oportunidad de trabajo con un mejor ingreso mensual, y que la producción sea buena y lograr buenos ingresos económicos, con las ganancias de la venta ella podrá realizar arreglos en la casa, para vivir mejor con  su compañero de vida y su hija.
texts.en:
Ana, 21 years old, left school in her first year of high school when she found herself pregnant. She currently lives with her partner, who works in farming. Her partner learned farming from his grandfather, as his father left him and his mother when he was little. The little girl is fifteen months old and she's very healthy. They all live in her mother-in-law's home. Everyone shares in the household expenses and thus everyone gets ahead together.

Ana devotes herself to her household work and she has dedicated her whole life to it since she had to work starting very young to help her family with the home expenses.That way she managed to get a job as a waitress in a restaurant in the city. It takes her 45 minutes to get to work every day.

With this loan, she will buy fertilizer and seeds for planting vegetables, her husband's work. They will benefit since the land they grow on has access to natural water that they can use to irrigate their crops, which grants them extra income when they sell their produce. With this loan they will be able to complete this project more quickly since they can buy everything they need with the money instead of going around all over the place.

Ana dreams of a future where she can finish her high school studies, since she feels she would be able to get a better job with a better salary that way. She also wants the crop produce to be good and to earn plenty of money, with the proceeds being used to make repairs to her home so that she and her partner and daughter can all live better.

loans.use: buy fertilizer and seeds for her vegetable crops.

loans.name: Caciana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SEÑOR DE PAN DE AZUCAR DE CALCA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Calca, perteneciente a la provincia de Calca y departamento de Cusco.

La socia Caciana tiene 46 años de edad,es conviviente y tiene 6 hijos,La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de crianza de animales como cuyes y pollos, la socia los hace engordar y crecer y luego los vende en las diferentes ferias,la socia tambien se dedica al negocio de venta de chicha que es una bebida a base de maiz,la socia tambien vende verduras,por medio de estos pequeños negocios la socia saca adelante a sus hijos,el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los animales.La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar cuyes y gallinas.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Caciana is a member of the Communal Bank "Señor de Pan de Azucar de Calca", which is located in the District of Calca, Calca Province, Department of Cusco.

She is 46 years old, in a common-law relationship, and has six children. Caciana divides her time between her daily activities and her business of raising animals, such as guinea pigs and chickens. She fattens and raises the animals before selling them at different fairs. Caciana also sells "chicha", a beverage made from corn, as well as vegetables. Through all of these small businesses, she is able to help her children move forward. Her dream is to have a shop where she can sell her animals. Caciana is requesting this loan in order to buy guinea pigs and chickens.

She is pleased to receive the loan and promises to complete her payments.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs and chickens.

loans.name: Alfredo

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal SEÑOR PAN DE AZUCAR DE CALCA, el banco está ubicado en el distrito de Calca, provincia de Calca y departamento de Cusco.
El socio Alfredo tiene 52 años de edad es conviviente y tiene 05 hijos, el socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de artesania, el socio lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a este negocio el cual le a bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, el socio distribuye su mercadería como polos, chompas entre otros a sus clientes que le solicitan, el socio desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
El socio solicita el crédito para la compra de chompas de alpaca.
El socio se siente agradecido por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
This bank member belongs to the communal bank "Señor Pan de Azucar de Calca." This bank is located in the Calca district, which is in the province of Calca and the department of Cusco.

Alfredo is 52 years old. He lives with his partner and has five children. He alternates his daily activities with his business of selling handicrafts. He has been in this business for quite some time, and it is going well for him thanks to the effort that he puts into it every day. He distributes his merchandise, such as polo shirts and sweaters, among other items, to his customers who request them. He wants to be able to continue working so that in this way he can continue supporting his family.

He is applying for the loan to buy alpaca sweaters.

He is grateful for the loan offered to him, and he promise to make the established payments.

loans.use: to buy alpaca sweaters

loans.name: Coster

texts.en:
Coster is 45 years old and married with four children. He also takes care of three relatives between the ages of 7 and 24 years. 

Coster provides financial services to people in his community by offering mobile money transfers. He works from 8:00 a.m. to 8:00 p.m. every day except for Sundays. Currently, he employs eight people. He has four years experience in the business.

This is Coster’s fourth loan from Kiva. He would like to take this opportunity to thank his lenders for helping him grow his business. The previous loans allowed Coster to be able to add new products to his business. He also has been able to grow the number of outlets he currently operates from three to five. Furthermore, Coster has been able to grow his working capital and serve more customers sending and receiving money from his shops. 

With some of the profits from his business growth, Coster has began building his own house, which is much bigger than the house he currently rents. He also emphasizes how the previous loans have helped him pay his children's school fees on time. He has repaid all the previous loans in good standing.

Coster has requested another loan from Kiva in order to open his sixth outlet near the army camp. He has identified a good location and is confident that once he sets up there, his new outlet will be profitable and provide an easy service to the army men and women who need financial services to send money home. He will use the money to purchase a trading booth and serve his new customers.  

He plans to use the profits from his growing business to complete building his family’s home.

loans.use: to set up his sixth mobile money transfer outlet near the army camp.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy three cows of a good breed in order to start an animal husbandry business

loans.name: Jesus Mi Salvador Group

texts.es: Yanet tiene 38 años es conviviente con 02 hijos educando. El se dedica al cuidado del adulto mayor hace varios años. Años atrás trabajaba como azafata en restaurants. Ver a sus hijos profesionales es su meta. El préstamo lo invertirá en la matricula y comprar de útiles escolares de sus 02 hijos.  En el grupo “JESUS MI SALVADOR” cumple la función de secretaria. El  grupo agradece el préstamo brindado. Yanet es la que viste polo a rayas de color blanco y plomo.
texts.en:
Yanet is 38 years old and lives with her two school aged children. She has worked as an adult care taker for several years. 

Many years ago she worked as a restaurant hostess. 

Her goal is to see her children become professionals.
 
She will use the loan to pay for school enrollment fees and buy school supplies for her two children. 

She serves as the secretary with The Jesús Mi Salvador Group. 

The group is very thankful for the loan. 

Yanet is the one wearing a white and plum colored striped shirt. 

.

loans.use: to pay for school enrollment fees and buy school supplies

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal SEÑOR PAN DE AZUCAR DE CALCA, el banco está ubicado en el distrito de Calca, provincia de Calca y departamento de Cusco.
La socia María Elena tiene 50 años de edad es conviviente y tiene 04 hijos, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de zapatos, la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia vende los zapatos a  sus clientes que le solicitan, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de zapatos para su negocio.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
María Elena is a member of the communal bank "Señor Pan de Azucar de Calca".  The bank is located in the district of Calca which is in the province of Calca and department of Cusco. 

María Elena is 50 years old, lives with her partner and has 4 children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her business of selling shoes.  She has spent a good amount of time working in this business which is going well for her thanks to the determination that she puts into her business every day.  She is a responsible and persevering person.  She sells shoes to her customers that request them from her.  She wants to be able to continue working so that in this way she can continue supporting her family. 

She is requesting the loan for the purchase of shoes for her business.

She feels very grateful for the loan given to her and is committed to complying with her established installment payments.

loans.use: to buy shoes for her business.

loans.name: Meira Paibi Group

texts.en:
Forty-one-year-old Medha is a weaver, and she is also the featured profile member for the group. She is pictured with her raised hand in the group picture. The literal meaning of “Meira Paibi” is “torch holder” and signifies the group as strong female torch holders. 

Medha’s husband serves as a government teacher in a government school, but she is determined to be financially independent and support the family by weaving all traditional wraparound skirts and others. Like-minded women folk from the same village joined hands and formed the group. They stood as one and support one another in times of need. The village is located about 35 kms from the main capital town of Manipur, and it is one of the northeastern states in India.

Medha usually purchases yarn, thread and silk thread from the main market, and weaves. She uses a loom for weaving, as it is more productive and profitable. She supplies in bulk to the women’s market in the main market and gets paid. The demand is high during the wedding season, which generally falls in the month of March until July, and that is the peak season for her weaving business.  

With the Kiva loan, she will purchase more stock of yarn in different colours, silk thread and weave.  She has plans to make a good sale before the peak season starts. Grateful and thankful towards Kiva and WSDS, she says, “Thank you so much, Kiva”. 

Her dream is to build a concrete house after managing savings together with her husband. She believes that her business will also expand and will improve her income.

The rest of the group members are engaged in selling vegetables, weaving, and tailoring.

loans.use: to purchase stock of yarn and silk thread to weave more woven products, sell them, and generate more income for the family.

loans.name: Sabougnouman Group

texts.fr:
Les cinq femmes du groupe Sabougnouman sont mariées dans des familles polygamiques. Elles ont en moyenne 38 ans et 4 enfants. Elles habitent toutes  dans le village de Banankoroniwere dans la région de Ségou (4ème Région administrative de la République du Mali). Elles se sont connues à travers des liens de voisinage, de parenté et de leurs activités génératrices de revenu dans le village. Elles font le petit commerce d’habits, de mil et de la restauration. Elles demandent ce prêt dans le but de diversifier leurs marchandises et  d’augmenter leurs fonds de commerce, les membres du groupe sont à leur 9eme cycle du prêt solidaire.
Madame Oumou  première assise à gauche est une grande vendeuse d’habillements dans le village de Banankoroniwere et environ. Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter 15 pièces de pagnes fancy pour  faire face à la demande clientèle. Elle revend au comptant par fois à crédit à la maison et au marché du village à une clientèle mixte. Madame Oumou  espère réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 20 000FCFA avec ce prêt. Ce bénéfice sera utilisé pour les frais de scolarisation de ses enfants et la prise en charge d’une partie de la famille pour aider son mari. Elle souhaite continuer le partenariat avec Soro Yiriwaso.
texts.en:
The five women of Sabougnouman Group are married into polygamous families. The group has an average age of 38, with an average number of 4 children each. They all live in the village of Banankoroniwere in the region of Ségou (the fourth administrative region of the Republic of Mali.) They met each other through being neighbours, through their families and though their money-raising activities in the village. They sell items of clothing, millet cereal and they also repair clothes. They are asking for this loan in order to diversify their merchandise and further their businesses. The group members are currently ninth-cycle borrowers.

Oumou, the woman sat on the left in the photo, is a successful clothing vendor in the village of Banankoroniwere and the surrounding area. She plans to use this loan in order to purchase 15 pieces of fancy "pagne" cloth in order to meet her customers' demands. She sells her stock for cash, sometimes for credit, both from her home and at the village market to male and female customers. Oumou hopes to earn an average monthly profit of 20,000 FCFA with this loan. These profits will be used to pay for her children's school fees and they will help her husband support their family. She hopes to continue working in partnership with Soro Yiriwaso.

loans.use: buy pieces of "pagne" cloth

loans.name: Lesly Juliana

texts.es:
Hay una niña llamada juliana ella tiene 16 años, a ella le gusta ayudar a las personas que lo necesita y entro a estudiar a campo alto por medio de la sobrina de la  mama que le conto que campo alto ofrecía oportunidades que ninguna otra institución ofrecía, por eso decidió  estudiar el curso de enfermería, pero la familia no tiene el  suficiente dinero para costear el segundo semestre, ya que tiene otras hermanas, una se llama Daniela la otra se llama Keidy,  las dos se encuentran muy felices  de  que la hermana se encuentre estudiando en lo que a ella le  gusta  y el padre es el que aporta todo en la familia para pagar los servicios y el arriendo y se esfuerza para que la hija pueda terminar el curso, ya que la esposa no a podido desempeñarse en  ningún cargo por falta de oportunidades y juliana no los puede ayudar económicamente ya que no ha terminado la secundaria y por lo tanto los padres hace lo posible para que las tres hijas salgan adelante. 
Por  eso ella quiere estudiar en campo alto, ya que campo alto le da la oportunidad de estudiar y más adelante poder tener trabajo,  por medio de este convenio con kiva lesly  quiere tener la oportunidad de terminar el curso, ya que ella esta  está muy  feliz porque  termino el primer semestre  y espera poder terminar el curso y no dejarlo a medias para así  mas adelante poder ayudar a los padres en lo que necesiten y a las hermanas darle la posibilidad de que estudien el curso que les guste.
texts.en:
There is a 16-year-old girl named Lesly Juliana. She likes to help people who need it and she came to Campo Alto to study because her mother's niece told her that Campo Alto offers opportunities that no other institution provides. 

She decided to study nursing, but her family does not have enough money to pay the fees for the second semester since they have two other daughters named Daniela and Keidy. These two are very happy that their sister is studying what she enjoys. Their father is the one who supports the family by paying for the rent and utilities. He is working hard so that his daughter can finish her course of study because he did not finish secondary school, so he is doing everything possible so that his daughters can move forward.

This is why she wants to study at Campo Alto, since Campo Alto provides her the opportunity to study and have a job in the future. With this Kiva loan, Lesly would like to have the opportunity to finish her course of study. She is very happy that she has finished her first semester. She hopes to be able to finish the program so that she can help her parents with what they need and provide her sisters with the opportunity to study what they like.

loans.use: to pay school fees for one semester.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.fr: Joseph est un homme de 59 ans marié père de 8 enfants dont l'âge varie entre 14 et 22 ans. Tous vont encore à l'école. Il a ouvert un salon de coiffure dame qu'il gère lui-même depuis 30 ans. C'est grâce à cette activité qu'il subvient aux besoins de sa famille. Il aimerai réaménager son salon pour mieux satisfaire sa clientèle c'est pour cela qu'il sollicite ce crédit. Cela lui permettra non seulement de satisfaire sa clientèle mais aussi d'augmenter ses bénéfices. Bénéfices qui seront réinvestis dans son activité pour l'agrandir.
texts.en: Joseph is a 59-year-old married man and father of 8 children between the ages of 14 and 22 years old, who are all receiving an education. He owns his own women's hairdressing salon, which he has managed single-handedly for 30 years. It is thanks to this business that he has been able to provide for his family. He would like to refurbish his salon in order to better satisfy his customers, which is why he is asking for this loan. This loan will not only satisfy his customers, but it will also allow him to increase his profits. These profits will be reinvested into his business in order to make it grow.

loans.use: to refurbish his hairdressing salon

loans.name: Uktam

texts.ru:
Уктам миролюбивый, спокойный и добродушный человек. Он с женой воспитывает троих детей. Уктаму 42 года. Он работает в сфере растениеводства. Уктам в течение 18 лет работает на своем земельном участке, выкладывая всю свою душу. Он растит своих детей от продажи урожая. 
   Уктам не давно закончил посев урожая и теперь хочет землю обработать минеральными удобрениями, чтобы получить богатый урожай. Но для покупки необходимог количество урожая у Уктама не хватает денег, поэтому он просит кредит. Помогите Уктаму. Он много старается, чтобы оправдать свои ожидания.
texts.en:
Utkam is a peaceful, calm, good-natured man. He is 42, married, and has three children. He is a farmer who has worked on his plot of land for 18 years, working with his whole soul. He feeds his children with his crop sales.

Uktam recently finished planting his crops and wants to treat the earth with mineral fertilizers to yield a rich harvest. Uktam does not have the money to buy enough fertilizer, so he is asking for a loan. Help Uktam. He tries very hard to live up to his own expectations.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers for a rich harvest

loans.name: Laila Yohana

texts.es:
Ella es laila y escogió la carrera de COCINA porque le gusta y ama lo que hace, además es una persona que se relaciona fácil con los demás, se deja querer, es amigable y noble, pero también tiene  carácter, es una persona talentosa, le gusta expresar el amor por los demás en la manera de ser y de cocinar,  lo que hace lo llena de amor y así mismo convierte los platos que cocina, no se complica en lo que hace, porque es una persona muy re cursiva y creativa. 
Ha luchado con mucho esfuerzo y ahora que en campo alto hay un convenio con Kiva a ella le gustaría obtener el descuento, ya que a si las cuotas le mejorarían la forma de pago y ya no tendría problemas para realizar el sueño de ser chef, la aspiración es poder acceder a un mejor trabajo en lo que a ella le gusta que es cocinar y con el tiempo tener el propio restaurante y así poder ayudar a la familia laboral y económicamente.
texts.en:
Laila chose a career in the kitchen because she likes it and she loves what she does.  She is also a person who connects easily with others.  She is lovable, friendly and noble but she also has character and she is a talented person.  She likes to express love for others in her manner of being and with her cooking.  She fills whatever she does with love and it’s the same with the dishes that she cooks.  The things she does aren't difficult for her because she is a very resourceful and creative person.

She has struggled with great effort and now that there is an agreement between Campo Alto and Kiva she would like to obtain the better rate since her method of paying in installments would improve and she wouldn’t have problems realizing her dream of being a chef.  Her aspiration is to be able to gain access to a better job doing what she likes which is cooking and with time to have her own restaurant and thus be able to help her family in terms of work and finances.

loans.use: to pay for a semester’s tuition.

loans.name: Rabiya

texts.ru: Рабие 52 года, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 1 дочь, дочь работает в швейном цеху помогает родителям материально. Супруг работает бухгалтером в сельской управе. У Рабии - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Рабия занимается животноводством, стартовав 21 год назад, с покупки скота на 10,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Рабии, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 дойные коровы, 18 овец. Ежемесячный доход составляет 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Рабия обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом - на покупку овец для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Рабия планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на улучшение материального обеспечения семьи.
texts.en:
Rabiya is 52 years old, married, and together with her spouse is raising one daughter. Her daughter works in a sewing workshop and helps her parents financially. Her husband works as an accountant in the village council. Rabiya has a secondary education. As a main source of income for her family, Rabiya raises livestock, having begun 21 years ago with a livestock purchase of 10,000 som KGS. Thanks to her hard work, Rabiya currently has on her homestead: two dairy cows and 18 sheep. Monthly income amounts to 10,000 som (KGS).

With the aim of further developing her homestead, Rabiya applied to the bank Bai-Tushum for a loan - to purchase sheep for increasing her headcount of livestock.

Rabiya plans to invest income from the loan in further propagation of the quantity of domestic animals, and plans to save money to improve the well-being of the family.

loans.use: to buy sheep

loans.name: Aichurok

texts.ru: Айчурок 65 лет, вдова, после смерти мужа сама воспитывает 2 детей. Старший сын занимается перевозкой пассажиров по маршрутам соседних городов, дочь помогает по хозяйству. У Айчурок - средне-специальное образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Айчурок занимается животноводством, стартовав 18 лет назад, с покупки скота на 8,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Айчурок, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 6 дойных коров. Ежемесячный доход составляет 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Айчурок обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом - на покупку нетелей для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Айчурок планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на строительство нового дома.
texts.en: Aichurok is 65 years old and a widow. After her husband’s death, she had to raise two children on her own. Her eldest son transports passengers to nearby towns. Her daughter helps out in the household. Aichurok has received vocational education. As a main source of income for her family, Aichurok is raising livestock, having launched this business 18 years ago by buying farm animals for 8,000 KGS. Thanks to Aichurok’s hard work, her farm now includes six dairy cows. Her monthly income is 10,000 KGS. In order to develop her business further, Aichurok has turned to the Bai Tushum microfinance institution in order to increase her  cattle headcount by buying heifers. Aichurok plans to use the income from her loan for an additional expansion of livestock, and also plans to save for building a new house.

loans.use: to buy heifers.

loans.name: Philadelphie Group

texts.fr: La cliente Julienne est une commerçante depuis 11 ans, présidente et membre d’un collectif d’affaires « Philadelphie», âgée de 40 ans, mariée et mère de 7 enfants dont,6 étudient et 1 est encore gosse. Elle est vendeuse des souliers usagés. Elle étale son activité dans la rue dans un marché de la ville. Elle sollicite un prêt auprès de Hekima pour accroitre ses activités. Elle va acheter 500 paires de souliers usagés. Son conjoint, lui aussi, est commerçant. Elle commença avec de fonds reçu de son mari. Dans l’avenir, elle souhaite accroitre son chiffre d’affaires, scolariser et nourrir  ses enfants. En définitif, elle remercie Hekima pour son soutien aux femmes entrepreneurs exclues du système bancaire classique, tout en accordant des crédits sans garantie matérielle, pendant la période difficile des conflits dans la région de l’Est du pays.
texts.en: The borrower, Julienne, has been a shopkeeper for 11 years. She is the president and a member of the "Philadelphie" business collective. She is a 40-year-old married mother of 7 children, 6 of which are receiving an education, the remaining child still being a baby. She sells second-hand shoes. She displays her wares on a street in one of the town's markets. She is requesting a loan from Hekima in order to grow her business. She plans to buy 500 pairs of second-hand shoes. Her partner is also a shopkeeper. She started her business with funds given to her by her husband. In the future, she is hoping to increase her turnover and to provide food and an education for her children. Finally, she would like to thank Hekima for the work their support of women entrepreneurs who are excluded from the established banking system by offering them loans without any material guarantees, especially during this difficult period of conflict in the east of the country.

loans.use: to buy 500 pairs of second-hand shoes

loans.name: Uulkan

texts.ru: Уулкан 51 год, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 2 детей. Дочь и сын работают в столице Кыргызстана, помогают родителям материально. У Уулкан - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Уулкан занимается животноводством, стартовав 21 год назад, с покупки скота на 10,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Уулкан, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 1 дойная корова, 24 овцы. Ежемесячный доход составляет 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Уулкан обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом - на покупку овец для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Уулкан планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на улучшение материального обеспечения семьи.
texts.en:
Uulkan is 51 years old, married, and with her husband has brought up two children. Their daughter and son work in the capital of Kyrgyzstan and help their parents financially. Uulkan has a secondary education. As a main source of income for her family, Uulkan raises livestock, having begun 21 years ago with a livestock purchase of 10,000 som KGS. Thanks to her hard work, Uulkan currently has on her homestead: one dairy cow and 24 sheep. Monthly income amounts to 10,000 som (KGS).

With the aim of further developing her homestead, Uulkan applied to the bank Bai-Tushum for a loan - to purchase sheep to increase headcount of livestock.

Uulkan plans to invest income from the loan in further propagation of the quantity of domestic animals, and plans to save money for improving the family's well-being.

loans.use: to buy sheep

loans.name: Niyozali

texts.ru:
Ниёзали житель района Спитамен и начинающий предприниматель. Ему 46 лет. Он женат и имеет одного сына. Несколько лет Ниёзали и его сын ехали в Россию и работали там в строительной бригаде. Его жена на рынке районе занималась оптовой продажей. Их семья накопило сбережение и теперь собирается открыть их собственный семейный бизнес в сфере продаж продуктов питания. Ниёзали приобрел магазин, а также морозильник, холодильник, электронные весы. Он просит кредит в размере 2500 долларов США, чтобы закупить продукты питания и открыть магазин. 
Ниёзали позитивный человек, он уже сейчас верит в успех своего нового бизнеса. Он надеется, что ему дадут шанс реализовать себя в новом бизнесе.
texts.en:
Niyozali is resident of the Spitamen region and a starting entrepreneur. He is 46 years old. He is married and has one son. For several years, Niyozali and his son left for Russia and worked there in a construction brigade. His wife was engaged in wholesale trade at the regional markets. Their family accumulated savings and now intends to open their own family business in the sphere of selling groceries.

Niyozali acquired a store, and also a freezer, refrigerator, and electronic scales. He is requesting a loan of $2,500 to buy groceries and open the store.

Niyozali is a positive person. He already believes in the success of his new business. He hopes that he will be given a chance to realize a new business for himself.

loans.use: to buy food products in order to open a grocery store in his region

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Javier De Jesús

texts.es:
Javier es un hombre humilde y trabajador, ha sacado adelante a su familia con el fruto de su arduo trabajo en diferentes actividades. Hace algunos años, ganó una licitación para iniciar una venta de frutas en un pequeño local ubicado dentro de una institución educativa, el oficio lo aprendió de manera empírica y, poco a poco fue adquiriendo experiencia y conocimientos en el manejo del negocio. De esta forma ha logrado generar los recursos suficientes para solventar los gastos del hogar y las necesidades básicas de su esposa y su única hija.
Con el apoyo del crédito, Javier quiere comprar un enfriador y surtido al por mayor (frutas, salsas dulces, helados, entre otros), esto le permitirá mejorar las condiciones de conservación de las frutas y podrá mejorar las ventas e ingresos que recibe como beneficio de su labor.
Javier manifiesta que su propósito es y será siempre velar por el bienestar de su familia, por ello quiere seguir trabajando arduamente y en un futuro a mediano plazo desea ampliar su negocio para que sea más rentable y le permita ofrecer mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Javier is a humble and hardworking man. He has supported his family with the fruits of his hard labor in several different endeavors. 

Some years ago, he won a bid to start selling fruit in a small shop located within an educational institution. He learned through experience and gradually gained knowledge about running a business from this trade. He has managed to generate enough resources to pay household expenses and meet the basic needs of his wife and daughter. 

With the support of a loan, Javier wants to buy a cooler stocked with fruits, sweet sauces, ice cream, and more in bulk. This will allow him to improve his fruit business and may improve sales and his revenues he receives through his work. 

Javier says that his purpose is, and always will be, to look after the welfare of his family. He wants to keep working hard and in the medium-term future, he wants to expand his business to be more profitable and allow a better quality of life for his family.

loans.use: to buy a cooler for his fruit, sweet sauces, and ice cream.

loans.name: Saron

texts.en:
Saron is a 59-year-old woman from Kampot province in Cambodia. She lives with her husband and four grown up children. Saron works as a Farm Business Advisor (FBA) with iDE. FBAs receive training from iDE in a range of business and agronomy skills. They in turn earn income by selling inputs and providing advice to their farmer clients. To supplement her income as an FBA, Saron’s family works together to make a living growing rice and vegetables and by collecting vegetables in their village to resell at the local market.

This loan will help Saron to expand and improve her vegetable production, enabling her to buy irrigation equipment and a range of vegetable seeds.  By improving her own vegetable production, she will also demonstrate the new techniques she has learnt with iDE and encourage other farmers in her village to become her clients.

loans.use: To buy irrigation equipment and inputs for her vegetable farm

loans.name: Jabbor

texts.ru: Джаббор активный и жизнелюбивый мужчина в возрасте 72 года. Он живет и работает на районе Шахритус. В Таджикистане зима приходит не очень холодно. Похолодает только на горах Памира. Но в Шахритусе зима приходит и уходит не заметно. Жители Шахритуса могут посадить урожай в любое время года, потому что солнце светит почти весь год. К этому доказательство фотография Джаббора. Фотография сделана в конец месяца января. Джаббор пользуясь благоприятным климатом родных мест, активно начинает посев картошки. Чтобы посадить картошку необходимо купить картошку и минеральные удобрения. Но для совершения покупки у Джаббора не хватает средств, Поэтому он обратился за кредитом. Помогите ему приобрести картошку и минеральные удобрения, чтобы посадить картошку.
texts.en:
Jabbor is an active and cheerful man of 72. He lives and works in the Shahrituz region. In Tajikistan, winter arrives and is not very cold. It gets cold on in the Pamira Mountains. But in Shahrituz winter comes and goes almost without notice. Residents of Shahrituz can plant crops at any time of year, because the sun shines almost the entire year. The proof is shown in the photograph of Jabbor; the photo was taken at the end of January.

Using the favorable climate of his native places, Jabbor actively begins the potato planting. In order to plant potatoes it is necessary to buy potatoes and mineral fertilizers. But for completing the purchase Jabbor does not have enough money, Therefore, he applied for a loan. He needs help to purchase potatoes and mineral fertilizers, in order to plant potatoes.

loans.use: to purchase seed potatoes and mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Mamurzhon

texts.ru:
Мамуржон житель светлого и солнечного района Шахритус. Шахритус находится на юго-западной части Республики. Мамурчон муж и отец. Он примерный семьянин. Мумурчон старается обеспечить своих детей и жену во всем. Он дехканин. Ему нравится его работа, климат Шахритуса прекрасно способствует развитию сельскохозяйственных культур, и он получает честный доход. 
  На данный момент Мамурчон готовиться посадить картошку для этого ему надо купить семена. Но чтобы купить необходимое количество семян, у него мало денег. Он просит ему помочь. Помогите.
texts.en:
Mamurjon is a resident of the bright and sunny region of Shahrituz. Shahrituz is located in the southwestern part of of the Republic. Mamurjon is a husband and father. He is an exemplary family man. Mamurjon strives to support his children and wife with everything. He is a private farmer. He likes his work. The climate of Shahrituz is perfectly supports to agriculture, and he receives and honest income.

Currently, Mamurjon is preparing to plant potatoes and for this he needs to buy seeds. But he has little money to buy the necessary quantity of seeds. He is requesting help.

loans.use: to buy seeds to plant potatoes

loans.name: Saida'zam

texts.ru: Саидаъзам живет на районе Гиссара. Ему 65 лет. Саидаъзам спокойный, миролюбивый и духовно богатый человек. Саидаъзам пастух. Он начал заниматься животноводством пару лет назад. На данный момент у него имеется 3 коровы и 8 голов барашек. Саидаъзам считает, что он набрался достаточного опыта, чтобы начать развивать бизнес животноводства. С расширением бизнеса увеличится доходность, что способствует покрыванию растущих расходов семьи. Саидаъзам просит помочь ему увеличить поголовья скота и купить корм, потому что его финансовое положение не позволяет ему самостоятельно развивать бизнес. Помогите ему.
texts.en: Saida'zam lives in the Gissar region of Tajikistan and is 65 years old.  He is a calm, peace-loving and spiritually-rich man who raises livestock for a living.  He's been at it for 2 years already, and currently has 3 cows and 8 lambs.  He feels that he's gained enough experience raising his animals to be able to expand his business further and make more money to pay for his family's growing expenses.  He currently lacks the funds to expand his business on his own, and is thus seeking your help to get a loan to be able to buy more cattle and cattle feed.

loans.use: buy fodder and cattle

loans.name: Jamshed

texts.ru: Чамшед молодой человек в возрасте 21 года. Он недавно женился и живет в одном с женой и бабушкой. В семье он работает один. У Чамшеда высшее неоконченное образование. Последние два года он занимается переработкой извести. За эти годы он приобрел своих постоянных клиентов, которые обращаются к его услугам. В данный момент Чамшед просит кредит в размере 1000 долларов США. На эту сумму и сумму своего сбережения он хочет приобрести автомашину марки Damaz для транспортировки продукции. Он надеется на Вашу поддержку.
texts.en:
Jamshed is a young person aged 21. Not long ago, he got married and he lives with his wife and grandmother. In the family, he alone works. Jamshed has an unfinished higher education.

For the past two years, he has been engaged in the processing of lime. Over these years, he has acquired his own regular customers who take advantage of his services. Currently, Jamshed is requesting a loan of US$1,000. With this sum and the amount of his savings, he wants to acquire a Damaz automobile for transporting the lime. He hopes for support.

loans.use: to purchase a Damaz automobile for transporting lime

loans.name: Salima

texts.en:
Salima is a married woman from Iraq who is 48-years-old and has two children.  Salima and her two children provide the family income together. 

Salima is a tailor and works from home. She has practiced tailoring since she was a child, but in 2002 she took her tailoring to a new level and started sewing clothes for a living. She has good experience in this field.

Salima is requesting a loan of 2,400 USD. She will use this loan to buy two specialized sewing machines. Through this loan, she believes that she will be able to grow her business and increase her profits. In doing so, she will be able to provide her family a comfortable life.

loans.use: to buy two specialized sewing machines

loans.name: Rawan

texts.en: Rawan is a 21-year-old lady who lives in a sector in Jordan called Irbid with her five siblings and her parents. Her father works at a governmental entity. Rawan is studying for her Bachelor's degree, majoring in Arabic Language. She is in her third year and is one step closer to graduation. She is planning to work in her study field after that to start helping her family financially as they are currently facing a financial crisis which is not helping them pay her upcoming semester fees. For this reason, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: to pay for her next semester fees.

loans.name: Bilal

texts.en:
Bilal is a 50 year-old married man from a small village near Jenin city. He is a father with twelve young kids; seven sons and five daughters. Bilal is as worker with a seasonal income. He suffers from chronic diseases and needs treatments each month.    
Bilal took a USD loan from FATEN, which will help him to pay the costs of the medicines and going to the doctor. By taking this loan, Bilal will be able to pay part of the urgent expenses he has now.

loans.use: to pay the costs of medicines and going to the doctor

loans.name: Mehnaz

texts.en:
Mehnaz is 31 and lives with her spouse and baby in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. Her husband has been selling seasonal and fresh fruit for many years in his hometown, using a four-wheel manual cart. As a result of his fruit’s freshness, he has attained a regular list of customers and makes enough to contribute to the family income. Due to this reputation, the demand for fruit has increased and by noon, his stock is finished.

Mehnaz is taking a loan for her husband so he can buy more fruit. She wants to save the additional profit for the future: for any sudden needs and her children's education.

loans.use: To buy fresh and seasonal fruits to sell.

loans.name: Tahira's Group

texts.en: Tahira is a 40-year-old married woman and a mother of four children. Her daughter has been running a primary school for many years at her home to meet her household expenditures. She is experienced in her subjects and in teaching good manners. In this way she is able to get more income; she teaches to the children living around her house and uses the income to support her entire family. The students in her school used to sit on ground for study purpose. She wants to provide them proper sitting arrangements and basic facilities. Due to lack of funds, however, she is unable to provide her students all described necessities because she does not have benches, tables and a whiteboard for school. Therefore, Tahira contacted BRAC Pakistan for a loan so that her daughter can buy furniture for the school. It’s, Tahira's third year with BRAC Pakistan and she has shown good repayment behavior. Her daughter is expecting a boost in her earnings and dreams of expanding her school in the future.

loans.use: To buy new furniture for school.

loans.name: Gita

texts.en:
Gita is a 36-year-old married woman with two sons and one daughter. She is from Awadhapur-2 of Kalaiya municipality of Bara district, Nepal. 

Her family has been in vegetable farming for five years. Vegetable farming is her major source of livelihood for her family. This has improved her standard of living and helped her to be able to send her children to a good school.

She has requested a loan amount of 20,000 Nepalese Rupees only for her vegetable farming to pay for seeds, ferlilizer so that she can increase her supply capacity.

Her plan for the future is for her daughter to get married and to build a new house.

loans.use: This borrower will use this money to pay for seeds, fertilizer so that she can expand her vegetable farming.

loans.name: Monika

texts.en: Monika is a 30-year-old married woman with three children. She lives in Mahespur of Bara district, Nepal. For the past 11 years, she and her husband have been running a shuttering business for the construction of buildings. She wants to expand her business, as there is currently a construction boom in her locality. To expand her shuttering business she wants to buy wood, so she has requested a loan amount of 100,000 NPR. The family is doing well in this business and would like to seize the opportunity offered by the construction boom. Through her business, she has improved her income and her family's standard of living.

loans.use: to pay for wood to expand her shuttering business

loans.name: Aysel

texts.en: Aysel has sewn bridal gowns for 35 years. Her husband is a retired laborer and she has three children, one of whom attends university. She is proud to be a strong woman and earn money. “My greatest achievement is my children going to school,” she said. She uses part of her house as a sewing area. She has two daughters who haven’t reached university age yet, so she has to work more, she says. Her goal is to open a fine sewing workshop and see her daughters finish university. She’ll use the loan to buy goods and materials. A very positive and hardworking woman, Aysel says she won’t stop working to keep her daughters from experiencing the difficulties she did.

loans.use: to buy goods and materials for her sewing business.

loans.name: Mumtaz

texts.en:
Mumtaz is a 46-year-old married woman. She is living with her husband in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. She is the mother of three daughters and two sons. She is doing embroidery work along with her daughter by her hands at home and financially supporting her family.

She belongs to a poor family; her husband’s income is very poor, so she decided to start embroidery work at home. She has been learning these arts since her young age, now she adopted it for her occupation. She enabled herself to be independent and earn sufficient income. 

She requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan to purchase stock of threads, silk, fancy sequins and pearls of various colors. She hopes that this loan will prove beneficial for her and for her family. Mumtaz is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To buy raw material for embroidery.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is a 36-year-old married man who has been working at polishing floor tiles for 13 years. This is his only source of living. Ahmad is a hard worker, well known in his region for his special talent. He has a reputation in his region and in nearby villages.

Ahmad is acquiring a loan from Kiva's partner Al Majmoua to buy necessary spare parts for his tiles polishing machine in addition to continuing to build additional room in his house to make it a healthier living place.

This is Ahmad's first experience as an Al Majmoua borrower. He hopes that with future loans he can work hard on increasing his business with new released items. He will develop his business more with the high quality of services provided.

loans.use: To buy necessary spare parts for his tiles polishing machine in addition to continuing to build additional room in his house to make it a healthier living place

loans.name: Khalil

texts.en:
Khalil is 21 years old and lives with his wife in Gaza. In 2012, he started his own café shop business in his town. It was an impressive step forward, and that's why he is working hard to improve it.

Khalil still needs to improve his business, so he asked Ryada for this youth loan to buy tables, an electronic generator, and a cooker. This will increase his customers, which will lead to an increase in his income.

Khalil hopes that someday his shop will be the most well known shop in his town.

loans.use: to buy tables, an electronic generator, and a cooker.

loans.name: Abed Alaziz

texts.en:
Abed Alaziz is 19-years-old and lives with his family in Gaza.  He left his education at the secondary stage.  One year ago he started his own internet coffee shop business for games and internet usage in his town.  It was an impressive step forward, and that's why he is working hard to improve it.

Abed Alazizstill needs to improve his business so he asked Ryada for this youth loan to buy two other PlayStation games and a LCD screen for showing this to increase his customers, which will lead to an increase in his income.

Abed Alaziz hopes that someday his shop will be the most well-known shop in his town.

loans.use: to buy two other PlayStation games and a LCD screen.

loans.name: Mariam

texts.en:
Mariam was born in 1967.  She is living in a sector in Jordan called Baqaa with her three children and her husband who works as a security supervisor.  For the past three years, she has been trying her best to support her husband in improving their living conditions and covering their children's needs by running her business of selling perfumes and cosmetic products at her own store. 

At this time, she needs to expand her business by buying a larger quantity of perfumes and cosmetic products to increase her profit.  But, she does not have enough money to do so.  For this reason, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: to buy perfumes and cosmetic products to sell.

loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
Ali is a youth client from Iraq. He is 29 years old, and is married with a single child, whom he works extra hours to provide for. Ali owns a hardware store. He sells plumbing tools, light bulbs, and other basic needs for a house. He has been in this business since 2012, and through practice he has gained good experience. Ali has become well-known in his surroundings due to his competitive prices. 

Ali is requesting a youth loan of 2,400 USD. He will use this loan to install a ceiling and to pay the annual rent of his hardware store. He believes this loan will improve his business, increase his profits, and will give him the ability to provide his family better living conditions.

loans.use: to install a ceiling and to pay the annual rent of his hardware store

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase two pigs for breeding

loans.name: Naseem's Group

texts.en:
Naseem is a 53-year-old lady residing in Lahore, Pakistan. She is the mother of four children. Her husband is engaged in providing transport services by driving a three-wheeler auto rickshaw and earns the income to meet the daily expanses of the family. For the past few days, his rickshaw is not working properly; therefore, he is unable to generate any amount of income.

In order to help her husband, Naseem has applied for a Kiva loan with three members of BRAC Pakistan. Her husband needs to maintain his auto rickshaw so that he can provide better transport services. It will be positive for Naseem to make savings to fulfill the needs of the entire family. She is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan. 

Note: Naseem raised her hand in the photo.

loans.use: To maintain her husband's auto rickshaw.

loans.name: Majeeda's Group

texts.en:
Majeeda is representing herself as a group leader and taking the responsibility for her group members. This is the fifth loan for Majeeda. 

Majeeda is a 55-year-old married woman living in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. She requested a loan for her son’s fruit-selling business. Her son owns a fruit shop and is participating in household expenses. He likes to sell seasonal fruits. Now he wants to buy oranges in large quantity to sell because their season is going on, and their price is very low. 

Therefore, Majeeda requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner so that her son can buy oranges in large quantity. 

Majeeda hopes that this loan will prove productive for her, and she will save a reasonable amount soon. She is very thankful to Kiva and field partner, BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy fresh and seasonal fruits to sell.

loans.name: Rubina

texts.en:
Rubina is the age of 31 and the mother of five children. Her husband owns a shop in which he has planted few compression molding machines. He takes order for manufacturing plastic accessories; he appointed labors over molding machines on daily wages. For the manufacturing of different plastic accessories he needs different category and quality raw materials. This time he has taken a huge contract than earlier but does not have enough amounts to buy additional molding machine and crushing raw material to continue his manufacturing. 
Therefore, Rubina requested a loan from kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan, so that her husband would be able to buy crushing plastic raw material for molding machine. 
She has to look after a huge family, she has to take care of her each kid, their school fees, their diet and about their health. For these purposes she has need of huge income and his husband is only single person who is responsible to bear household expenses. 
She is very happy after taking this loan; she thanks to kiva and field partner, BRAC Pakistan

loans.use: To buy crushing raw material for manufacturing.

loans.name: Angey Liliana

texts.es:
Ella es Liliana, se intereso por esta carrera porque le gustaría brindar  una educación inicial de calidad a la primera infancia, es asegurar el acceso y permanencia a niños y niñas menores de 5 años a la prestación de servicios que garanticen como mínimo los derechos a educación inicial, atención y cuidado, nutrición y salud.

Ella necesitaría del convenio con kiva por qué no tiene los recursos económicos para poder seguir cancelando las cuotas con el valor que lo venían haciendo y no quiere que por este motivo se interrumpa la educación que ella está teniendo en este momento. 
Ella quiere poder prestar los servicios como pedagoga infantil y brindarles conocimientos a la etapa inicial de la educación  en niños y niñas de 0-5 años y poder seguir preparándose y ser una profesional en el área de educación infantil.
texts.en:
Liliana was interested in this career because she would like to provide quality early childhood education and to secure access and continuity to the provision of services that ensure as a minimum the right to early education, attention and care, nutrition and health for boys and girls under 5 years of age.

She would need the arrangement with Kiva because she doesn’t have the financial resources to be able to continue paying the installments as she had been doing and she doesn’t want for her education to be interrupted at this time for this reason.

She wants to be able to provide her services as an early childhood teacher and provide boys and girls from 0 to 5 years old with knowledge at the initial stage of education and to be able to continue preparing herself and be a professional in the area of early childhood education.

loans.use: To pay for a semester’s tuition.

loans.name: Jyotsna

texts.en:
Jyotsna is a 42 year old woman of Dhupguri. She has her husband and three children in her family. She and her husband both are illiterate can sign their names only. They are illiterate but they are fully concerned to educate their children. All of Jyotsna’s children are studying in different classes in the village school.
